author: damien
msg: Fixed spurious console errors caused when attempting to query information about an already closed socket.

author: ccustine
msg: SMX4-335 Replace the Geronimo mail bundle with Sun's ri

- I've gone ahead and removed the geronimo API spec jar completely.  ServiceMix Mail component was wiring to the older geronimo API spec so it couldn't find the Sun RI impl.  Best to just have one for now.

author: olamy
msg: prefer session.getExecutionProperties() than System.getProperties() (as it can cause issue in a multithreaded env)
